name: E-Commerce Website
desc: A user-friendly e-commerce website built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering a seamless shopping experience with intuitive design and secure transactions for hassle-free online shopping.

name: Portfolio Website
desc: A stylish portfolio website created with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, displaying creative work with smooth animations and interactive features, accessible on all devices for showcasing talents effectively.

name: Money Tracker Web App
desc: A handy money tracker web app built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, featuring easy design and functionality for simple budget tracking. Accessible on any device, it helps users manage expenses and savings effortlessly.

name: Spotify_clone
desc: A Spotify-like web app made with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, offering smooth music streaming and easy navigation for an enjoyable listening experience.
